prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Bass, Synth Pad, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
Organ-less, this song features Drums, Guitar, Bass, and a Synth Pad.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Guitar, Bass, and a Synth Pad, but no Organ.

Style 3:
No Organ is included in this song, but it does have Drums, Guitar, Bass, and a Synth Pad.
